title: 1887 Opening Day Scorecard Brooklyn vs. Metropolitan
author: ShoelessBob

posts.post_title: 1887 Opening Day Scorecard Brooklyn vs. Metropolitan
posts.post_content: I have an Opening day April 16, 1887 scorecard from the game between Brooklyn and Metropolitans for sale.   The scorecard has some writing on it and it has been scored.  Final score of the game was 14-10 Brooklyn.  Asking $550.  Please email me if interested.
